papers.title: Navigating the Frontiers of Encryption in Mobile Forensics
papers.focus: Mobile forensics with hybrid AI and cloud computing
papers.abstract: This paper explores advanced approaches to overcoming encryption challenges in mobile device forensics by leveraging AI algorithms alongside cloud computing resources.

papers.title: Towards Behavioural Secure Authentication Using Keystroke Dynamics
papers.focus: Biometric authentication with ensemble machine learning classifiers
papers.abstract: This upcoming paper presents a keystroke dynamics-based authentication framework using ensemble classifiers (SVM, KNN, Random Forest), emphasizing accuracy improvements and dynamic thresholding to reduce false rejections.

papers.title: Complex Resource Allocation and Energy Consumption in 5G and Modern Wireless Networks
papers.focus: Analyzing energy efficiency challenges in advanced wireless technologies
papers.abstract: This study investigates the complexities of resource allocation in 5G and beyond networks, highlighting causes of higher energy consumption and proposing potential optimization strategies.
